titles.title: District of Columbia Membership on Capitol Police Board Act
To provide for the membership of the Chief of the Metropolitan Police Department of the District of Columbia on the Capitol Police Board on an ex-officio, nonvoting basis.
District of Columbia Membership on Capitol Police Board Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
District of Columbia Membership on Capitol Police Board Act
This bill places the Chief of the Metropolitan Police Department of the District of Columbia on the Capitol Police Board as an ex officio, nonvoting member.
